name: Shattered Skies (Sleeprunner Studios)
description:
GAME

The floating islands were torn apart, causing the lighthouse's power supply to be destroyed. Your task is to reconnect the broken parts of the main island to it in order to restore the energy supply. Without the light of the lighthouse, the travelers of the Heavenly People will forever be lost and disoriented.

Maneuver your glider through roaring air currents Make use of the wind portals to refill the ancient power stones with energy Unite the scattered fragments of the floating isle

Shattered Skies is a contribution for the Mini Beans Jam and was made within 48 hours. 

The Version 1.1 brings several minor fixes:

  • Improved Sound Mixing
  • A little UI layout tweak for the dialogue box
  • Adjustment of decals in the level
  • A fix for the speedboosting portals, which caused the camera to reset its position when entering a second portal. 

The updated version was updloaded 4 hours after the Jam - the original version (1.0) is still available.
